mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_META_TB_SPEC WHERE MTS_EN_NM = #{mtsEnNm} AND DEL_YN = 'N' LIMIT 1 )

SELECT TB_SPEC.MTS_ID , TB_SPEC.MTS_KO_NM , TB_SPEC.MTS_EN_NM , TB_SPEC.MTS_DEF , TB_SPEC.SRC_SYS , TB_SPEC.SRC_TB_NM , TB_SPEC.SRC_DB_CD , CODE.CODE_NM AS SRC_DB_NM , TB_SPEC.MTS_DSC , TB_SPEC.DEL_YN , TB_SPEC.RGST_ID , TB_SPEC.RGST_DT , TB_SPEC.MODI_ID , TB_SPEC.MODI_DT FROM T_META_TB_SPEC TB_SPEC INNER JOIN T_CODE CODE ON TB_SPEC.SRC_DB_CD = CODE.CODE_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM T_META_TB_SPEC
SELECT MTS_ID , MTS_KO_NM , MTS_EN_NM , MTS_DEF , SRC_SYS , SRC_TB_NM , SRC_DB_CD , MTS_DSC , DEL_YN , RGST_ID , RGST_DT , MODI_ID , MODI_DT FROM T_META_TB_SPEC WHERE MTS_ID = #{mtsId}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_META_TB_SPEC SET DEL_YN = 'Y' , MODI_ID = #{modiId} , MODI_DT = now() WHERE MTS_ID = #{mtsId}
